website_summaries.verdict: Vintage design toaster has 1.5-inch wide slots for many types of food.
pros: Available in red, silver, or black
Offers 7 different shade settings to give you just the right toasting level
Has defrost, bagel, and reheat settings
Features a high lift lever to remove the food
cons: Seems to burn the toast more often than some units

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but a horrible toaster
customer_reviews.text: I am so shocked that a KitchenAid product performance so poorly. The toasting is inconsistent, not only from slot to slot, but from used to use on the same settings, and surprisingly from top to bottom of the piece of bread or bagel in a single slot. I will probably replace this with a cheap, no name toaster because at the end of the day, It does not matter how pretty the toaster looks on your counter if it can’t do basic toasting. If you buy this, prepare yourself for bread and bagels that are half burned and half untoasted. And also, the thing is unnecessarily large.
customer_reviews.author: McSassypants

customer_reviews.title: You pays your money and you takes your choice
customer_reviews.text: Sure, there are lots of cheaper toasters out there. But you get what you pay for. I'm tired of fooling around with cheap tools. Now I just go with the best brand of small appliances on planet Earth: KitchenAid. Never have a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: The Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Hot, hot, hot....
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and style of the toaster. I’m not so sure about the controls being on the side. A tiny peeve. What I was very unaware of was how hot this toaster gets. Don’t touch it for at least 10 minutes, or more, or it will burn the crap out of you. Don’t even move it! It was between this and the Cuisinart and I have a bit of buyers remorse. It’s ok, but the whole unit gets so hot. Not just the toasting area.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S

customer_reviews.title: Toaster works well and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love my new toaster! That bright red is such a cheerful splash of color on the counter. It toasts faster than my old toaster, and gives a nice, uniform brown. The red finish doesn’t show fingerprints like stainless steel does, and the crumb tray makes cleaning it easy. I love the buzzer when the toast is ready, as I’m prone to pop some bread down then get sidetracked and forget about it. The slots are nice and wide, so bagels and buns fit with no problem. I’ve only had the toaster for about a month, so I don’t know how long it will last, but it seems well made and durable. I highly recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is excellent, and delivery was on-time. Any NEW appliance, toaster, stove, etc., requires a run-in to remove the protective mineral oil (prevents rust in storage) when manufactured. With this in mind, I ran the toaster once at setting 3, twice at 4 & 5. I did not notice see light smoke or any discernible smell from the new appliance oil. Tested with my favorite bread and it was perfect. The light chime at the end of the toasting time is a very nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Blew a Fuse
customer_reviews.text: The first time we used this toaster, it blew a fuse in our kitchen. My husband did not realize at first what had happened because he had been out of the room. When the toaster did not work, he plugged it into a different wall plug. There was a burning wire smell and smoke begin pouring out of the toaster. Needless to say, we returned the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Bread Warmer Alert !
customer_reviews.text: A little over a year ago I purchased a Kitchenaid Pro Line toaster. I should have my head examined for purchasing a $250 toaster but that's another story. I returned it when it would only begin to brown (very lightly) on the maximum setting. This year I purchased this model and I have another 'bread warmer'. It's seems like the legal dept got involved and warned that if the bread got too hot people would burn themselves and sue. What I finally had to do was use a lower setting (#3) and lower the bread TWICE. You might think that twice on #3 would equal once on #6 but you would be wrong. I tried it several times.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Since I paid over $61.00 for this toaster back in 7/2018, I would expect it to last longer than 2 years, but it didn’t. Quit working in May 2020. I won’t buy this expensive toaster again because if it’s only going to last a few years, I might as well buy a cheaper toaster. I had thought KitchenAid would stand up to the test of time but it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Riley

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like cooking a piece of meat on low
customer_reviews.text: basically, other toasters burn the outside and never even heat up the inside. This makes toast that doesn't get black, but it toasts it thoroughly. It takes a little longer and doesn't turn black because it actually heats all of the bread. Kinda like cooking a piece of meat on low. It doesn't burn the outside, but the whole thing is toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Toasts all sorts of things well
customer_reviews.text: Reviews for toasters are all over the board - units either suck or are amazing. Not sure if I'm that polarized, but can attest that this toaster has successfully toasted bagels, bread, and english muffins. It looks nice too. It's a toaster, so it's not a life changing device, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Smells like burnt plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and it smelled like burnt plastic the first time it was used. And the second and the third time ... looked inside and it had these little plastic sheeths on the prongs. Thought it must have been an unpacking mistake and then threw it away and ordered another one. Straight out of the box, has these same plastic pieces that melt and smell toxic. There must be something wrong with their manufacturing process. Def don’t buy you can’t remove these things and it makes the whole unit impossible to use without creating a toxic stench in your house.
customer_reviews.author: IO

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, it's looks good too
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toaster for 3 months now and it's great. It toasts evenly and consistently plus the toasting time is quite quick. The slots are generous in size and take bagels comfortably. It looks to be well made and it's design is nice enough to leave out on my stainless steel bench-tops. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie D

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster; deafening alert.
customer_reviews.text: This toasts well, both frozen and room temp breads. It is solid / heavy, I like the placement of controls and the overall look. I would give it 5 stars if it didn’t emit a high-pitched, ear-splitting tone just before the toast pops up.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works good.
customer_reviews.text: It toasts in half the time as my old one. Looks great. It appears that one slice comes out slightly darker than the other one. Of well, it’s not perfect but I won’t let good and perfect become enemies... pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Bart Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster, produces tasty toast, looks sharp next my other kitchenaide appliances, slightly retro, but not too trendy to look silly in a couple of years. Fair price too. Such a big difference in toast from toaster oven and an actual toaster. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful, but doesn't toast well
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, but doesn't toast well. I have to toast on setting 6 and then toast the same item again on setting 1 in order to get desired outcome. The KitchenAid toaster that I purchased in 1998 toasted perfectly, but it just died which prompted by purchase of a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my new KitchenAide toaster
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new KitchenAide toaster. I like the size of the slots and the keep warm function. The color is perfect match with my stand mixer. I have been keeping my eyes open for a replacement toaster for some time. My old wide slot long style is also KitchenAide and I loved it but at 20 years old I new it was a matter of time . This is a perfect replacement:)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wyles

customer_reviews.title: great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I debated between this one and the significantly more expensive pro line and decided I'd go with this one to save the money. I'm glad I did, this toaster does everything it should, the settings are just right for the degree of toasting and the bell and lift features are awesome! fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had this toaster for over a year, and I have had no problems whatsoever. I truly think some of the other reviews are from people that have a screw loose in their head. Sometimes you have to put it down twice for a bagel and thicker homemade breads. But it works like a charm and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Joe bread head

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and retro look
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and retro look. Easy to use. Built very well and is solid. On the darkest setting my toast on white bread is just barely dark enough. I usually have to toast it alittle longer to get it brown enough. Bagles and english muffins take more that one drop also. Easy to clean and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Haile

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Kitchen Aid
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking piece of junk. I have tried toasting bagels and got poor results. Same with bread. It looks like the heating element is only partially working. My advice...don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sursely

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: We have other KitchenAid products that we are very happy with, but this toaster isn't one of them. As others have stated, the toaster have 6 settings but the darkest setting still does not toast anything close to being what most folks refer to as toast. And if you attempt to toast it again it will then actually burn the bread or muffin etc. We used this for 3 weeks and finally sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: George Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I’ve ever owned. A little spendy, but it really adjusts easily to the level brown I want. Pops the toast out, ready to go, with subtle alarm. This toaster is more intuitive than other toasters. It seems to be durable too. We loved our first one so much that we bought a second one for our other home and Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this is my second kitchen aid toaster. Only replaced my first one because the knob broke. but this one didn't last 6 months before the middle heating element died. now I can only toast on one side. Very disappointed.I thought they made a better product. Obviously not. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: M. Casper

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Much better than any toaster I have owned. The defrost mode cooks frozen products perfectly. When toasting bread it is still somewhat uneven top to bottom. Sliced fresh bread does fit and stays soft inside when toasted. Only con is that the cord is heavy duty so it is very bulky. I bought the black and it is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: R Haidet

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT TOAST!
customer_reviews.text: I was beyond excited to get this sleek, easy to use, with a few bells and whistles toaster. BUT, it does NOT TOAST! I have set it as high as it goes to the darkest 6, and I still have to do it again for a short time! Then the top crust is too dark and the rest still a little soft. I really do not understand the 5 star ratings! Maybe those people just want a warm mushy toast. I will return it. Thank heavens I saved the box! VERY VERY DISAPPOINTING! Especially from Kitchen Aid!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't evenly toast
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews of toasters and deciding on this well reviewed mid-range price toaster I have to say I am disappointed. Looks beautiful, feels substantial, nice features. Doesn't toast evenly. One side of your bread will come out lighter than the other. Consequently, if you toast only bagels you are good. If you want bread toasted (bagel function not selected) you may have to flip your bread half way through. It's a basic so it's important in my book.
customer_reviews.author: A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: It's making the poor thing miserable
customer_reviews.text: It has a loud beep to announce the toast is done and there is no way to turn the beep off. I have two dogs and one of them hates the beep so much she hides in the other room in the morning. It's making the poor thing miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Barrows

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for and you will know for sure when the toast is ready!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrific. About the only thing I would change is the little beep it gives when the toast pops up. Sounds kind of like a fire alarm going off. Other than that it is a great toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Norman

customer_reviews.title: Well made toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this toaster a few times, but I can tell you so far I Love it. It even feels like it is well made. The toast browns evenly on both sides and it’s easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, but a little quirky...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the toaster!! Huge black industrial looking cord is ugly though. I have to try to hide it behind other stuff. At first I wasn't crazy about the way it toasted, but either I got used to it, or it's "settled in", if that is possible(?) Once you get used to the way it toasts, you'll love it; this toaster is truly beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Dpeeps

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, Horrible, Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toaster I have ever owned. It just does not toast well. I have had it for 3 months now and had to replace with another toaster because it is horrible. It takes two full cycles to get it toast bread, English muffins, and bagels. It may look good, don’t be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Very substantial, not a poorly made item. High quality. Should be listed as a cool touch toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Terrable toaster
customer_reviews.text: None of the settings work. With the dunness setting max and any of the buttons it takes two or three times to toast a piece of bread. BUY SOMETHING ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Came with plastic caps stuck inside, TWICE. Not usable.
customer_reviews.text: When I turned on the first one, I immediately smell plastic burning. I took out the bread, and looked inside, there are 4 plastic caps stuck in side. I exchanged it and the second one came as the same. Do not buy this. I am ordering a different toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Lahnstein

customer_reviews.title: Two out of Two Defective.  Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: The first toaster lasted two weeks and then the basket wouldn’t stay down to activate the heating element. Returned for new one. Just took the new one out of the box and guess what? The basket won’t stay down to activate the heating element. This one goes back as well and I’ll find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for toasting bagels and english muffins. Pros: Looks great and from a looks prospective it has held up well. Con: Two years in it no longer works. Whatever the latch is that holds the toast down no longer works. Seems like it should last longer than 2 years. I'd say it was used 2 times a week on average over the 2 years before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Peter in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using the toaster for about two months. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alena R. Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: Typically a very dependable model
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing a toaster exactly like this with the same model because we enjoyed it so much. I did have to exercise the warranty on this one however because there was a small fire flareup internally which of course was concerning. Waiting for my replacement to be sent now. That never happened with my old toaster however.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Mason

customer_reviews.title: Finally a toaster that just works.
customer_reviews.text: Enough features without over complicating it. It is plain and simple. Adjust the amount you like and leave it there. Makes toast, waffle and that's about all I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Little bulky but it works great, great design. I would prefer the buttons rather on the front of the narrow side of the toaster but that is just because my counter doesn't have much space to put it side ways.
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is horrible. I should of returned it, but we had already used it, and I just didn't want to deal. The best I can do at this point is tell others to not purchase this product. Turning the dial to "dark" only gets your bread slightly toasted. You then have to toast again, but now turn the dial to "light" otherwise your toast will burn. This toaster gets an D-. I do like the appearance, but functionality sucks.
customer_reviews.author: sbvisions

customer_reviews.title: I love the toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love the toaster, but I had purchased it for my husband for Christmas. It did not come wrapped in paper or in another box. It was left on my front porch in its own box. Very disappointed that my husband got it off porch first. No surprise for him! Toaster works great.
customer_reviews.author: Racer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful - Can't make toast
customer_reviews.text: Looks Beautiful - Can't make toast. Very uneven toast, burns the tops. On the plus the bagel and defrost actually adjust the heating element. Made in China, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy burnt toast, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: Toaster is...well.. trash. I am appalled by the quality as KitchenAid usually has excellent items. It does not toast evenly. It burns most items and the cord placement is odd. I question if this is a legitimate KitchenAid product. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite toaster EVER !
customer_reviews.text: This toaster does everything. Did not know I needed a new toaster until I got this one. Particularly lover the button on the side which allows you to cause the toast to pop up mid cycle if you desire. Well made, very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toaster but too big for my cupboard
customer_reviews.text: You want perfect toast this is the machine. Unfortunately, I ended up returning it because it was too big to fit in my kitchen cupboard. I don't like things on my countertop when there not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: the "one sided" toasting feature is very useful. The high lift lever
customer_reviews.text: The evenness of bread browning is superb. When toasting English muffins, or bagels, the "one sided" toasting feature is very useful. The high lift lever, and clean out tray, make for easy toast extraction and crumb cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: rsteffee

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, but doesn't heat as well as my old kitchen aid toaster, must be turned way up to toast,
customer_reviews.author: kat krause

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what kind of bread.
customer_reviews.text: I think this toaster was tested on white bread. We use an organic multigrain bread and we have to toast bread twice. 1st on the high setting then on 2 the second time in order to get a good toast. This past week we had white bread and made a perfect toast.
customer_reviews.author: Busie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect. Fits bagels, long slices, and toast great on both side.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! I’ve always hated toasters. They have all seemed cheap and never seemed to work very well. You can tell this one is quality. I have several kitchen aide products and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Sjw

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A toaster that toasts dark brown!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first toaster I have owned that actually toasts dark brown without having to turn it up to eleven. Sleek design, matches my other small appliances, does great with bagels as well.
customer_reviews.author: BellaSunder

customer_reviews.title: Love this Kitchen Aid toaster
customer_reviews.text: This Kitchen Aid toaster, is not just beautiful on our counter, it toasts very evenly. I love the keep warm option.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Expensive but Toasts perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love Kitchen Aide products. Can't go wrong with this toaster. A little expensive, but looks great, toasts to perfection I am sure it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Miller

customer_reviews.title: and my husband and cats do not like the beeper
customer_reviews.text: Have to put muffins through a second cycle to get them brown enough, and my husband and cats do not like the beeper.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Well built and worth the miney
customer_reviews.text: Have to say the best toaster I have ever purchased. Love how it has a little chime before the toast pops up. Letting you know it is ready. Toast perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought “how bad could a KitchenAid toaster be?” So I ordered it. Believe the reviews because this is probably the worst toaster I’ve used. The toasting is very uneven and the doneness is inconsistent even when you toast the same item with the same setting.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I like the very rich red color and the wider slots. The controls are easy to use but toaster does warm up after toasting the first slices of bread making it necessary to reduce the darkness selector or the second batch of toast may be too dark. That said, I absolutely love this toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R.

customer_reviews.title: It works FANTASTIC! It's quick and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Light but not too light. It works FANTASTIC! It's quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: does not toast
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking toaster.... but that's it! It does not TOAST. I have to put toast in for two cycles for LUKE WARM bread. Unfortunately I waited too long to return it so I basically lost my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed - Uneven heating and very quick to burn.
customer_reviews.text: Heating on our unit was very uneven. We make lots of toaster waffles and it would burn the lower half and leave the upper half soggy. Also, it seems to heat very fast so there is little room for error. Setting 3 left everything soggy and setting 4 burned the bottom half to black and stunk up the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: James M Brink

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know a toaster could be so gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This fabulous toaster really adds class and pizzazz to our kitchen! It works perfectly too, with great features like bagel, defrost, and keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Harding

customer_reviews.title: Toasting
customer_reviews.text: Toasts evenly but not dark enough even on dark. Have to toast on dark and then toast again on 3 to have it dark enough.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Bellis

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster a lot. I like that it defrosts, keeps my toast warm without continued browning and it is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie West

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Our last Kitchenaid toaster lasted over 20 years so we stayed with the brand. I like the defrost button for frozen bagels and the bell when the toast is ready.
customer_reviews.author: BJT

customer_reviews.title: So I like the space it takes up back next to my ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has a "side" design. So I like the space it takes up back next to my wall, leaving prep room in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: jajic

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Only hope it keeps producing a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only hope it keeps producing a great slice of toast after 6 months. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Markgraf

customer_reviews.title: What happened KitchenAid??!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased recently and not happy with this toaster at all. I have a number of KitchenAid products that I am very happy with. But the toaster doesn't toast correctly. I have to toast it a few times for it to be done. Going back to the Cuisinart toaster! Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Even Toast Every Time
customer_reviews.text: This gets used almost daily in this house. Toast is always evenly toasted. Have had it little over 6 months with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Daulong

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful great great great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I’ve had in my 83 years use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks as nice in person as on the web site
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix guy

customer_reviews.title: Makes noise (bep) when DONE. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves it and it works very well. It was on the costly side but I'm hoping it will have for a very long time..
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster only problem is that if u want ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster only problem is that if u want your toast really dark u have to push the button down twice. U r supposed to hit the cancel button and not force the push down bar up manually like all other toasters. Matches all my Kitchen aid appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 60 days it quit working.
customer_reviews.text: Getting support is nearly impossible, even though there is a 1 year warranty. The 'live-chat' his non-responsive, the email request for help has gone unanswered. $60 dollars and $60 days in and no one will help me with a toaster that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Pena

customer_reviews.title: Fastest toaster i ever owned. If you are making ...
customer_reviews.text: Fastest toaster i ever owned. If you are making alot of toast. The toast will get darker when making toast one after the other
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Coburn

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I obviously received a defective toaster. Even on the darkest setting it would barely toast the bread. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good product...
customer_reviews.text: The product came with simple instructions and toasted perfectly from the very first slice we used... Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Best thing is it toasts fast your not waiting forever for your toast to pop up! Quality made to last.
customer_reviews.author: b-kozi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the proce.
customer_reviews.text: Uneven toasting, the top edge of the bread is burned and the bottom isn't even brown. HUGE footprint on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster!! I love that I can toast a bagel comfortably and it is simple and clean in design. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: b.rae

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job on toasting bagels
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is it is so lightweight. It replaced a Sunbeam I'd had for about 50 years. I don't envision this one lasting as long. It does a good job on toasting bagels.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything KitchenAid! And this toaster doesn't disappoint! Toasts things perfectly and I just love that it has a bagel button. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A very good product. I was disappointed that it is no longer made in USA. Many KitchenAid products are.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Long

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to get this at such a great price. I love KitchenAid appliances and have been on the lookout for a new toaster to fit our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LaShorage Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: It toasts very fast and evenly. I usually toast at a lower setting, like 3 and if I want it a little darker, I toast it again at 1. It’s also beautiful to look at. Toasts bagels nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough to leave on counter
customer_reviews.text: Waited long time to find toaster that looked as good as it worked
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: The toaster will not stay in the down mode to toast. Appears there is an electric magnet that will not hold it down. Waste of my money. Maybe just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best toaster I ever owned. Love the auditble bell telling me my toast is ready
customer_reviews.text: toaster was sort of expensive, but well worth the extra money, it makes the best toast, has a warmer, even has an auditble bell when it pops up.
customer_reviews.author: blaineo

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toaster when I got it - but it broke - just stopped working within 3 weeks... Have many other Kitchen Aid products and have never been unhappy but this was the worst..
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Crawley

customer_reviews.title: the wife love it. great upgrade from our older toaster that ...
customer_reviews.text: the wife love it. great upgrade from our older toaster that quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Fstopf4

customer_reviews.title: Need to learn the proper settings
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tough to know the correct settings at first. For example, a 3 or 4 won't toast an english muffin like other toasters.
customer_reviews.author: LKS

customer_reviews.title: Love my new toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new toaster. It took a while to figure out the correct level of toasting to have it set on. But it’s sleek, looks great on my counter, & gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This toaster started out great! After 10 months, the lever worked itself loose. The lever will not work. The toaster is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great toaster! I love KitchenAid products. They are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly and it matches all my other Liquid Graphite Kitchenaid appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a little to big for my counter. Did not expect it to be so big.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szaniszlo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster was not working properly. You had to set it to the darkest setting to get a slightly toasted toast. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster we have ever had, by several degrees. Looks fantastic and really toasts well with easy controls. We'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fridgemon

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. It toasts evenly and I love the lift up feature. More than I would usually pay for a toaster but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jodrey-Byam

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KMT2116ER 2 Slice Slot Toaster with High Lift Lever, Empire Red
product_meta.description:
Color:Empire RedMake a statement on your counter with the newly designed KitchenAid 2-Slice Toaster. This toaster features 7 shade settings, including Bagel, Defrost, Reheat and Keep Warm. A high lift lever is convenient for removing smaller slices of bread or to check toasting progress at any time.

BRAND STORY
By KitchenAid
feature_bullets: High Lift Lever / Easy-to-Clean, Removable Crumb Tray
7 Shade Settings with Bagel, Defrost, Reheat and Keep Warm
